description.en:
According to the visitors of 'World of Spectrum' this game, written by Bo Jangeborg, is the best game for the ZX Spectrum.
 
The Atari 8-bit version is a direct port of the C64 version and was executed by:
Code: Mariusz
Screens: Jose Pereira
Sound FX: Wieczor
 
Fairlight for Atari 8-bit was release at christmas 2016.
